00442                                 if ( i_line == 0 ) RelPhi = wireR2Phi - cell_dphi/2;

00445                                 rotateMatrix->rotateZ(-RelPhi); 
00446                                 rotateMatrix->rotateX(theta);

00448                                 centerVec.setTheta(pi/2);
00449                                 centerVec.setPhi(RelPhi);

00451                                         std::cout<<"Placing (2, "<<i_line<<"): rotateZ("<<-RelPhi/deg<<"deg), rotaeX("<<-theta/deg<<"deg), R = "<<centerVec.mag()/mm<<"mm"<<std::endl;

00458                 //  together with wires that belong to Cdc container
00459                 G4LogicalVolume* log_CdcContainer = get_logicalVolume(MVol_name);

00461                 //              for ( int cellId = 0; cellId < 1; cellId++ ){
00462                 for ( int cellId = 0; cellId < cellNo; cellId++ ){
00463                         //place cell
00464                         G4double SPhi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_phi(layerId,cellId);
00465                         G4double phi = SPhi - wireR2Phi;
00466                         G4RotationMatrix* rotateMatrix=new G4RotationMatrix();
00467                         rotateMatrix->rotateZ(-phi);
00468                         int ReplicaNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_ReplicaNo( layerId, cellId );
00469                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00470                                 std::cout<<"Placing cell: phi = "<<phi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00471                         }
00472                         new G4PVPlacement(rotateMatrix,G4ThreeVector(0.,0.,0.),log_cell,CellName,log_CdcContainer,false,ReplicaNo,checkOverlap);
00473                         if ( layer_type == 2 || layer_type == 4 ){
00474                                 for ( int i_line = 0; i_line < 2; i_line++ ){//0, left; 1, right
00475                                         G4LogicalVolume* log_wire;
00476                                         G4LogicalVolume* log_mother;
00477                                         G4String name;
00478                                         log_wire = log_FieldWire_in;
00479                                         name = FieldWireName;
00480                                         log_mother = log_CdcContainer;
00481                                         if ( i_line == 0 ) RelPhi = wireR2Phi - cell_dphi/2;
00482                                         else RelPhi = wireR2Phi;
00483                                         G4double dPhi;
00484                                         if ( layer_type == 2 ) dPhi = alpha_RMin;
00485                                         else if ( layer_type == 4 ) dPhi = -alpha_RMin;
00486                                         wire_pos_R = RMin*cos(alpha_RMin);
00487                                         theta = atan(RMin*sin(alpha_RMin)/layer_halfzlen);
00488                                         G4RotationMatrix* rotMatrix=new G4RotationMatrix();
00489                                         rotMatrix->rotateZ(-phi-RelPhi-dPhi);   
00490                                         rotMatrix->rotateX(theta);
00491                                         centerVec.setMag(wire_pos_R);
00492                                         centerVec.setTheta(pi/2);
00493                                         centerVec.setPhi(phi+RelPhi+dPhi);
00494                                         new G4PVPlacement(rotMatrix,centerVec,log_wire,name,log_mother,false,0,checkOverlap);
00495                                         //std::cout<<"Placing inner field wire of layer["<<layerId<<"], type["<<layer_type<<"]:"<<std::endl;
00496                                         //std::cout<<"  Rc = "<<wire_pos_R/mm<<", theta = "<<theta/rad<<std::endl;
00497                                 }
00498                         }
00499                 }
00500         }//end loop in layers
00501 }
